Mega Laser.auradesc: Deals massive damage in a straight line in front of your ship.also destroys bullets.

Mega Bomb.auradesc: Damages enemies on screen in a large radius
Mega Bomb.ultauradesc: Enemies in the charging reticle will receive double damage

Teleport.auradesc: Teleports the ship anywhere on screen
Teleport.ultauradesc: destroys bullets in a small radius around your ship upon arrival

Reflex EMP.auradesc: Destroys bullets in a moderate radius around your ship
Reflex EMP.ultauradesc: deals moderate damage to ships in the radius of the blast

Personal Shield.auradesc: Become Invulnerable for a short time.
Personal Shield.ultauradesc: reflects enemy laser back at them, dealing considerable damage

Tracking Minigun.auradesc: activates a tracking minigun when charged
Tracking Minigun.ultauradesc: shoots homing missiles along with the minigun

Trinity Teleport.auradesc: shoots a moderate damage projectile upon arrival
Trinity Teleport.ultauradesc: destroys bullets in a small radius around your ship upon arrival
